exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type B : Type Join_A : Join A Join_B : Join B SA_A : SeparationAlgebra A SA_B : SeparationAlgebra B The term "A" has type "Type" while it is expected to have type "nat".

original: apply Build_SeparationAlgebra with (A * B). - intros m1 m2 m H. inversion H. apply Join_B0. - intros mx my mz mxy mxyz H1 H2. destruct H1 as [myz [H3 H4]]. exists (mz, myz). split. + apply Join_B0. + apply H4.
